channel.title: Serious Sam
channel.description:
Just a thread to discuss serious sam. I recently bought Serious Sam HD(not even noticing it was the SECOND encounter, doesn't even matter though) and had a lot of fun with it... so I decided to make a discussion thread for it.
PS: I hate kleers.

item.title: Serious Sam
item.dc:creator: BillSplatter
item.description:
SoaringScout:

PS: I hate kleers.

tell me about it… though i have yet to get serious sam HD

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Sam
item.dc:creator: sofiadavis1
item.description:
You will get a pretty good idea of what the game’s all about. There’s some context to why the game is set around the ancient pyramids in Egypt, why Sam have facing an alien menace all by himself, and why his enemies can teleport into the vicinity without any notice.The original Serious Sam boasted a 3D graphics engine that could render incredibly huge levels packed with incredibly large numbers of enemies.

Read full topic
